author: craigmcc
msg: Backport removing the "System.exit(0)" call at the end of the main()

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove the "System.exit(0)" call at the end of the main() method, so that
you can stop an embedded Tomcat via Bootstrap.main() with a "stop"
argument without shutting down the entire JVM.

author: craigmcc
msg: Look up the MBeanServer domain into which ObjectNames should be created,
Migrate all of the Catalina beans into domain "Catalina", so that you can
support independent sets of beans for different applications being
managed, with no risk of name collisions.
